00050 static float rna_PoseBone_do_envelope(bPoseChannel *chan, float *vec)
00051 {
00052     Bone *bone = chan->bone;
00053 
00054     float scale = (bone->flag & BONE_MULT_VG_ENV) == BONE_MULT_VG_ENV ? bone->weight : 1.0f;
00055 
00056     return distfactor_to_bone(vec, chan->pose_head, chan->pose_tail, bone->rad_head * scale,
00057                               bone->rad_tail * scale, bone->dist * scale);
00058 }
00059 #else
00060 
00061 void RNA_api_pose(StructRNA *srna)
00062 {
00063     /* FunctionRNA *func; */
00064     /* PropertyRNA *parm; */
00065 }
00066 
00067 void RNA_api_pose_channel(StructRNA *srna)
00068 {
00069     PropertyRNA *parm;
00070     FunctionRNA *func;
00071 
00072     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "evaluate_envelope", "rna_PoseBone_do_envelope");
00073     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Calculate bone envelope at given point");
00074     parm = RNA_def_float_vector_xyz(func, "point", 3, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Point",
00075                                    "Position in 3d space to evaluate", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00076     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00077     /* return value */
00078     parm = RNA_def_float(func, "factor", 0, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Factor", "Envelope factor", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00079     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
00080 }
